description: A small, unassuming plant that appears as a seed with tiny roots. Despite its fragile appearance, the Seed of Possibility holds within it the potential for great and mysterious growth. When threatened, it emits an aura that causes nearby beings to feel a deep sense of wonder and possibility, often leading to unexpected outcomes.

traits.name: Aura of Possibility
traits.description: Creatures within 20 feet of the Seed of Possibility must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed for 1 minute, experiencing vivid visions of their greatest potential. While charmed in this way, creatures cannot take actions that would harm the Seed of Possibility.

traits.name: Adaptive Growth
traits.description: Once per day, the Seed of Possibility can transform into a random plant creature with a CR equal to or less than its own. This transformation lasts for 1 hour, after which the Seed reverts to its original form.

actions.name: Entangle
actions.description: The Seed of Possibility can cause the ground in a 15-foot radius to become overgrown with vines and roots. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be restrained by the entangling plants. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check, freeing itself on a success.
